already_used_ip:
With your Own (%s)-IP address, %s user has sat down to play at this table.
The same IP address at a table is not allowed in the game.
However, you can go to another room to play.
auto_re_buy_exp: Instantly buy you back when your chips run out on the table.
auto_top_off_exp: Instantly top your chips to your initial buy-in at the end of each hand.
blocked_domain: In this domain the “phpBB Holdem Póker” software can not be run!
blocked_points_room: In this domain, only the practice rooms are used!
cards_error: An error occurred while reading the cards!
com_tour_last_winner: Winner of the last tournament: %s, winning %s.
confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to exit?
confirm_standup: Are you sure you stand up?
confirm_tour_exit: If you quit now you lose the tournament!
confirm_tour_standup: If you stand up now, you lose the tournament!
confirm_tour_start:
If you start the tournament now, no more users will be able to join the tournament.
Are you sure you want to start the tournament now?
err_browse_storage:
The game is not allowed to be used for security reasons!

This is because the browser’s local and session storage are not available! If you want to play, you must allow your browser to use local and session storage!
err_dup_window: It is not allowed to use multiple windows at the same time!
ext_disabled: The “phpBB Holdem Póker” extension has been disabled!
info_change_room_limit: You’ve been stand up because an administrator has changed the Buy-in Amount.
info_change_room_type: You’ve been stand up because an administrator has changed the room type.
info_disconnect: You’ve been stand up because you haven’t been online for a long time!
info_forum_disabled: You’ve been stand up because the forum has been disabled!
info_inactive: You’ve been stand up because you did not react to anything for a long time.
info_lose_tour: Unfortunately, you have lost this tournament now, but don’t be discouraged, you may win the next one.
info_no_perm_play: You do not have permission to play poker.
info_not_chips: You’ve been stand up because you lost all your chips!
info_poker_disabled: You’ve been stand up because the poker has been disabled!
info_win_tour: Congratulations! You won the tournament. We wish you more good games.
invalid_data: The data needed for the game was not received, so the process was stopped!
jackpot_ticket: Buy a JackPot ticket for the next hand - %d chips.
jp_list_empty: There is no JackPot winner yet.
jva_core_ext_disable: The “JVA - Core” extension has been disabled!
no_chips_jp_ticket: You did not buy the JackPot ticket!
no_chips_play: You don’t have enough chips to play at this table!
no_chips_tour: You don’t have enough chips to start the tournament!
no_fullscreen: Your browser does not support full screen mode.
no_valid_data_ajax_error:
Ajax Error: The server has been processing the data incorrectly!

Please notify the website administrator.
room_close: All chairs are occupied in the room. No other users can enter the room. Please wait until at least one chair becomes empty.
room_close_tour: The tournament has already started. Additional users are not permitted to enter the room.
room_stop: The room was stopped by an administrator, so you was stand up.
room_stop_jpt: The price of the JackPot ticket has been refunded.
room_stop_normal: All your chips in play have been refunded.
room_stop_tn_jpt: Furthermore the price of the JackPot ticket has also been refunded.
room_stop_tour: The tournament Buy-in has been refunded.
shout_learner:
Welcome! In this room you can learn to play with free and open cards.
The won chips cannot be taken out of the room.
We wish you a pleasant relaxation.
shout_normal:
Welcome! The minimum amount required to sit down is %s the highest %s.
We wish you a pleasant relaxation.
shout_normal_admin_refund: The administrator stopped the game, so the chips were refunded to the users in the game.
shout_normal_disc_refund: All users were disconnected, so the chips were refunded to the users in the game.
shout_normal_fix:
Welcome! The amount required for the sit down is %s.
We wish you a pleasant relaxation.
shout_practice:
Welcome! You can play and practice in this room for free.
The won chips cannot be taken out of the room.
We wish you a pleasant relaxation.
shout_tour_admin_refund: The administrator stopped the game, so the tournament was closed and buy-ins were refunded to users who were still in the game.
shout_tour_disc_refund: All users were disconnected, so the tournament was closed and buy-ins were refunded to users who were still in the game.
shout_tournament:
Welcome! The amount required for the sit down is %s.
We wish you luck in winning.
shout_tournament_run: Welcome! The tournament is now running, so you can only participate in the next tournament.
shout_win_tour: The winner of the tournament was %s, winning: %s.
